name: WitchAction
description: One day, Corona tried to invite Noah for a date, and when I went to Noah's house ... Noah was turned into a sheep! Beside that there was a figure of a mischievous witch, Grette. The place I chased after was "world of sweets" produced by Grette.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsVista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5-3230M or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 720M or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
